articles.description: Heat extremes included a temperature of 38C at Verkhoyansk, Russian Federation, provisionally the highest known temperature anywhere north of the Arctic...

articles.author: DAVID LEE
articles.title: Football: S'pore held to 2-2 draw by 10-man Timor-Leste at U-23 Asian Cup qualifiers - The Straits Times
articles.description: Timor-Leste forward Gali was sent off in the 42th minute but Young Lions failed to capitalise.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: SINGAPORE - Ahead of Timor-Leste's clash with Singapore at the Under-23 Asian Cup qualifiers, forward Paulo Gali - who had been in the centre of an age-fraud storm - had wanted people to focus on his… [+3533 chars]
